subject: Does VAJ Has these features??
msgSnippet: Hi Thanks for you info, but we need information as how it will help us to test Enterprise Applications in the real time situations?? Our understandings goes as
messageBody:
Hi
Thanks for you info, but we need information as how it will help us
to test Enterprise Applications in the real time situations??

Our understandings goes as belows
we were able to integrate JUNIT with Visual age for java 4.0 and
could also able create the test case using the Junit3.7.Creater.
Is it possible to create the test cases for Servlet /jsp/ejb??
Is it possible to create the test case for a particular method in a
class ??


with regards
selva
